CatDescriptText: Ida Adams, 3927 Harry Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 30, 1958, pg. 3 with question: "Do you think that Negroes make full use of their voting franchise by registering and voting in both the primary and the general election?"  Answer reads: "Yes, we do."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Ida Adams wearing dark dress with light colored buttons, posed sideways on street with pedestrians and stores, including Kays in background
